snippet: The authorities canceled a ceremony for the team, Paris Saint-Germain, after rampaging fans injured 32 people after the team’s victory.
abstract: Officials in Paris cancel city hall ceremony for champions of France’s national soccer league after hundreds of rampaging fans attacked stores, cars and police officers in the capital during celebrations for winning team, Paris St-Germain.
lead_paragraph: The authorities canceled a ceremony for the team, Paris Saint-Germain, after rampaging fans injured 32 people after the team’s victory.

headline.seo: Paris Cancels Celebration for Soccer Champions
headline.main: Paris Cancels Celebration for Soccer Champions
